coastal.name: Default
coastal.summary: Focusing on gathering information, and maintaining map control

roles.name: Mojo
roles.summary: Take Bottom Red Control, Hold SMOKE For A cross, Push Bottom A

roles.name: Mystik
roles.summary: SMOKE Left Side Statue, Play Slow On Coast, Observer Defenders Nades and Positions

roles.name: Fire
roles.summary: Play slow on B, Kill flankers, Get defender playstyle info on B

roles.name: Calcifer
roles.summary: Pressure Broken with Jben, SMOKE Connector, Play Broken Wall

roles.name: Jben
roles.summary: SMOKE Right Side Statue, Pressure broken, flank tank, Help Push A

coastal.name: B Default
coastal.summary: 2 Push Site From Front, 1 from yellow, 1 holds street

roles.name: Mojo
roles.summary: SMOKE Front Truck, Can Nade Barrels, Smoke signals start of push

roles.name: Mystik
roles.summary: Nade statue at beginning of push, Hold Yellow Control

roles.name: Fire
roles.summary: Peeks barrels; L; or Truck from garden, Hold street and truck on push

roles.name: Calcifer
roles.summary: Hold T-Con, SMOKE To Cross Arch Safe if Playing Arch, Gather Info On Aggressive A Pushers, Move to team when possible

roles.name: Jben
roles.summary: Hold white box, Can Nade L, Push where nessassary

coastal.name: B Snake
coastal.summary: 3 through street taking L turn and Back B Stairs, pinching on B site

roles.name: Mojo
roles.summary: SMOKE Front Truck, Take Stair Control

roles.name: Mystik
roles.summary: Nade L Turn, Signal GO when getting ready to nade

roles.name: Fire
roles.summary: Nades white box, SMOKE Connector, Holds Back Truck Control

roles.name: Calcifer
roles.summary: Holds T-Con, free to nade or SMOKE whatever

roles.name: Jben
roles.summary: Free Nade, Take L Control

coastal.name: A Coast Heavy
coastal.summary: Get Headshot Control, Double MID Smokes, pressure A, Smoke Tank

roles.name: Mojo
roles.summary: Pressure through bottom A, CAN hold SMOKE for tank

roles.name: Mystik
roles.summary: SMOKE Left Side Statue, nade A-Alley

roles.name: Fire
roles.summary: Control Headshot on Broken, Nade A Bombsite

roles.name: Calcifer
roles.summary: SMOKE tank late for cross, Hold Flank/Mid/Top A

roles.name: Jben
roles.summary: SMOKE right side statue, Nade front red, Hold coastal
